text: Ahmed Ashraf Al-Fiqi (, born 31 December 1992) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Al-Hilal . Ahmed Ashraf - Soccerway ==Club career== Ahmed Ashraf started in the Al-Shalhoub Academy for the Saudi player Mohammad Al-Shalhoub in Riyadh, He represented the Saudi Arabia national football team, in a 2017 Gulf Cup of Nations and after allowing the Born in Saudi Arabia to participate in the Saudi League signed his first professional for season and half contract with Al-Hilal on January 10, 2018 . and renewed his contract with Al-Hilal for 2-years on December 27, 2018 . and he signed a one-year contract with Al-Faisaly on loan from Al-Hilal on August 22, 2019 . ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia international footballers Category:Saudi Arabian people of Egyptian descent Category:Association football wingers Category:Al Hilal SFC players Category:Al-Faisaly FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players
title: Ahmed Ashraf
